description: Advertisement items before the GMS campaign

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is provided upon registration is successful. Required for all requests. Example: 1 minutes

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to exclude the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Example: 1615959999

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to this API. Wait 10 minutes use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for request

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id using sha256

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: The GMS Campaign ID. Provide if available

parameters.name: item_id_list
parameters.description: Item IDs to add/remove. Maximum 1 item ID

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error code when it failed. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: Indicate warning details if no warning. Empty if no warning happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for API request for error tracking
